name: Type
headline: The AI-first document editor.
description: Type.ai is an AI writing tool and document editor that helps anyone write high-quality content quickly. Rather than writing important content from scratch, individuals and teams can use Type to instantly generate high-substance drafts, revise and rewrite content, and get personalized ideas on what to write next.

founders.name: Stew Fortier, Founder
founders.description: Founder and writer. Co-founder & CEO at Type.ai (W23). Previously co-founded Foster (W21). Before that, I served as the CTO of Banzai and an EIR at the Allen Institute for Artificial Intelligence.

founders.name: Stefan Li, Founder
founders.description: Software engineer and product builder. Previously founder of Recall Labs. Before that I worked at Facebook, Walmart Labs, and Sony as a software engineer with heavy focus on product.

# The AI writing assistant for professionals
Generate, refine, and publish content with the all-in-one AI writing tool.
[![Google's logo](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6552b89c2624b95125bb6da0/67251e2aadf27740fee51fb4_Google%20Icon.png)Start with Google](https://type.ai/</login.html?signup=true>)[Start with email](https://type.ai/</login.html?signup=true>)[Start writing for free](https://type.ai/</login.html?signup=true>)
Your browser does not support the video tag. 
## Trusted by 100k+ writers and leading teams
From startups to global enterprises, professionals choose Type.ai to elevate their writing.
[![Amazon's logo](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6552b89c2624b95125bb6da0/664b9d854da9ad37b5604449_Amazon%20logo.avif)](https://type.ai/<https:/amazon.com>)[![Buffer's logo. Buffer uses Type's AI document generator.](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6552b89c2624b95125bb6da0/664b9d85d5db58bb34b258b6_Buffer%20logo.avif)](https://type.ai/<https:/buffer.com>)[![Princeton University logo. Princeton is a customer of Type.](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6552b89c2624b95125bb6da0/664b9d85493ee41238b248e2_Princeton%20University%20logo.avif)](https://type.ai/<https:/www.princeton.edu>)[![Dolby Digital's logo. Dolby is a customer of Type.](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6552b89c2624b95125bb6da0/664b9d855ca14997bb43be52_Dolby%20Logo.avif)](https://type.ai/<https:/about.gitlab.com/>)
[![LogRocket's logo. LogRocket is a customer of Type.](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6552b89c2624b95125bb6da0/664b9f0e8d79ae15b6c0f022_LogRocket%20Logo%20-%20Edited.avif)](https://type.ai/<https:/logrocket.com>)[![Fundrise's logo. Fundrise is a customer of Type.](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6552b89c2624b95125bb6da0/664b9f0d47649872209d485f_Fundrise%20Logo%20-%20Edited.avif)](https://type.ai/<https:/fundrise.com/>)[![rudderstack logo](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6552b89c2624b95125bb6da0/664b9f0e493ee41238b3116f_Rudderstack%20logo%20-%20Edited.avif)](https://type.ai/<https:/www.rudderstack.com/>)[![Pepsico's logo. Pepsico is a customer of Type.](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6552b89c2624b95125bb6da0/664b9f0e5660d10f505bf04d_Pepsico%20logo%20-%20Edited.avif)](https://type.ai/<https:/www.pepsico.com/>)
## Go from blank page to ‚Äúdone‚Äù faster than ever before
Type.ai is designed to help you write, edit, format, and publish better than ever before.
![An AI chat icon](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6552b89c2624b95125bb6da0/65721e5532f11cdfd4196c79_sparkles.avif)
### AI Writing Assistant
#### Collaborate with a helpful thought partner
Brainstorm, write, and revise content with powerful AI that knows about you and your writing.Powered by OpenAI‚Äôs GPT-4o and Anthropic‚Äôs Claude 3.5 Sonnet, you can harness the best models for the job.
[Chat with Type now ‚Üí](https://type.ai/</login.html?signup=true>)
![This is a background pattern. Nothing to see here.](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6552b89c2624b95125bb6da0/656a39bd1da7317629b34fb2_Mask%20group.avif)
![This is a background pattern. Nothing to see here.](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6552b89c2624b95125bb6da0/65f46ec559c0e45f3fc1fa85_Mask%20group%20\(48\).avif)
![An AI document generator icon](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6552b89c2624b95125bb6da0/65f470240b41bf6a4ebf8c1a_generate%20\(1\).avif)
### AI document Editor
#### Generate documents with substance and style
Upload source material, specify your writing style, and leave the blank page behind forever. Then, edit, refine, and polish your drafts inside Type‚Äôs AI document editor.
[Generate a document ‚Üí](https://type.ai/</features/generate-draft>)
![An AI rewrite icon](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6552b89c2624b95125bb6da0/6570e1b64940c2aa05476f94_paintbrush.avif)
### AI Writing Editor
#### Edit and refine an existing document
Type.ai is the AI text editor that goes beyond dotting your i‚Äôs and crossing your t‚Äôs. Just import or paste in your writing and tap ‚ÄúImprove.‚Äù
[Improve your writing‚Üí](https://type.ai/</features/ai-rewrite>)
![This is a background pattern. Nothing to see here.](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6552b89c2624b95125bb6da0/656a2d82d1efea808c7ae631_Mask%20group.avif)
![This is a background pattern. Nothing to see here.](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6552b89c2624b95125bb6da0/656a2d82d1efea808c7ae631_Mask%20group.avif)
![An AI brainstorm icon](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6552b89c2624b95125bb6da0/6570e05fbcce2aef8e7bcb83_lightbulb.avif)
### Writing Idea generator
#### Discover your next big idea with real-time suggestions
Type‚Äôs writing AI analyzes your document and generates new ideas as you write. Spot a suggestion you love? Just tap ‚ÄúWrite it for me.‚Äù
[Write better with Type ‚Üí](https://type.ai/</login.html?signup=true>)
![An AI writing command icon](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6552b89c2624b95125bb6da0/6570e1b6fadc53921415d015_text-cursor-input.avif)
### AI Word Generator
#### Write faster with AI that lives at your cursor
Type's inline AI can generate sentences, lists, and paragraphs directly at your cursor. Stuck? Just tap `/` to summon autocomplete from the future.
[Speed up you writing ‚Üí](https://type.ai/</login.html?signup=true>)
![This is a background pattern. Nothing to see here.](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6552b89c2624b95125bb6da0/656a39a1b4a0d5e4a7a82123_Mask%20group-1.avif)
![This is a background pattern. Nothing to see here.](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6552b89c2624b95125bb6da0/656a39b06b248c279010930d_Mask%20group-2.avif)
![An AI rewrite icon](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6552b89c2624b95125bb6da0/6570e1b64940c2aa05476f94_paintbrush.avif)
### Go Beyond Grammarly
#### Replace Grammarly forever
Type.ai gives you all the proofreading and grammar checking features you'd get with Grammarly Premium, plus AI writing features that elevate the quality and substance of your writing.
[Try Type for free ‚Üí](https://type.ai/</login.html?signup=true>)
## All inside of a modern word processor
Offline mode. Keyboard shortcuts. Version history. Type goes beyond basic AI text editing to deliver a complete writing experience.
![An image of Type's document editor offline capabilities.](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6552b89c2624b95125bb6da0/65ef82ee3c8e776ccfb1a11d_Frame%2020701.avif)
![This is a background pattern. Nothing to see here.](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6552b89c2624b95125bb6da0/656a2d82d1efea808c7ae631_Mask%20group.avif)
Full offline capability
Write anywhere, anytime, even without internet connection. Documents save locally and sync when you‚Äôre back online.
![An image of the file types that Type's document editor exports to: they include Docx, PDF, HTML.](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6552b89c2624b95125bb6da0/65ef8306800c275dda92304e_Frame%2020702.avif)
![This is a background pattern. Nothing to see here.](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6552b89c2624b95125bb6da0/656a39b06b248c279010930d_Mask%20group-2.avif)
Multiple export file types
Export your document as a PDF, Word doc (DOC/DOCX), HTML, or Markdown file.
![An image of the math and code blocks that Type's document editor supports.](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6552b89c2624b95125bb6da0/65ef831173e2d2471c9b18c5_Frame%2020703.avif)
![This is a background pattern. Nothing to see here.](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6552b89c2624b95125bb6da0/656a39a1b4a0d5e4a7a82123_Mask%20group-1.avif)
Flexible content formats
Embed images, code blocks, and math notation. Your content retains its format when copy-pasted into other sites, like Google Docs or Notion.
![An image of Type's AI writing and editing features.](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6552b89c2624b95125bb6da0/65ef831c6c4d2bbb8d2aaa6f_Frame%2020704.avif)
![This is a background pattern. Nothing to see here.](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6552b89c2624b95125bb6da0/656a39bd1da7317629b34fb2_Mask%20group.avif)
Keyboard Shortcuts
Navigate the app, edit your document, and summon AI help without leaving your keyboard.
## Get started with a writing template
Select an expert-curated writing template and Type‚Äôs AI will fill it out with your ideas.

Full offline capability

generated_description:
### Summary of Type.ai

**Company Overview:**
Founded in 2022 and based in New York, Type.ai is a cutting-edge AI-first document editor designed to expedite the writing process for individuals and teams. With a compact but dedicated team of just three employees, the company is leveraging the power of artificial intelligence to revolutionize how content is created and refined. Their unique position as part of the Y Combinator Batch W23 highlights their innovative approach and potential for scaling.

**Mission:**
